name: Aman Verma

experience.title: Volunteer
experience.description: "There is no better satisfaction than serving the needy." CRY has always had the vision of working towards the betterment of the backbone of society, our children.In this path of service,the IIT Kharagpur Volunteer Chapter of CRY conducts school sessions every Saturday in the Middle School of Amlatoria and Arasini, where we teach the students from class 1 to 4. We also conduct regular surveys and organise medical camps and community meetings for the welfare of the students around the campus.
experience.description_html: "There is no better satisfaction than serving the needy." CRY has always had the vision of working towards the betterment of the backbone of society, our children.In this path of service,the IIT Kharagpur Volunteer Chapter of CRY conducts school sessions every Saturday in the Middle School of Amlatoria and Arasini, where we teach the students from class 1 to 4. We also conduct regular surveys and organise medical camps and community meetings for the welfare of the students around the campus.

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: We are a group of people trying to develop a culture of Open Source on campus. For this, we conduct the Kharagpur Winter of Code (KWoC) every year in December every year participated by around 1500 students. We also conducted Ubuntu Install Fest and Python and Git classes for igniting the coding culture here.
experience.description_html: We are a group of people trying to develop a culture of Open Source on campus. For this, we conduct the Kharagpur Winter of Code (KWoC) every year in December every year participated by around 1500 students. We also conducted Ubuntu Install Fest and Python and Git classes for igniting the coding culture here. <!---->
